verbs.description: familiarise (third-person singular simple present familiarises, present participle familiarising, simple past and past participle familiarised)

entries.meaning: Non-Oxford British English standard spelling of familiarize.
examples: Mr Avery was a great believer in mnemonics; he had one for every possible aspect of flying – which was as good a way as any for student pilots to familiarise themselves with their new environment  […]
